__e: We have limited resources and we go to war to protect them.
We know so much in this world and what we do now is so limited, and everyday we finding more.
But the confinement, the lack of space - so small, so very limited, and always the same, day after day.
You understand that our time is limited, don't you?
So I went inside and looked around, and it occurred to me... that there's a very limited space there.
All these years, I have known all along that my life with you was limited.
